entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
